review_data.title: take away with uber eats
review_data.content: We got take away with uber eats. Fast delivery, big portions and Very good food! Suggested👍🏻 we will definitely order again

review_data.title: Wordt Ticka Massalla I ever had
review_data.content: I got a Ticka Massalla and a Samosa delivered to my place last night. it was my worst indian experience and I love Indian food. There was almost no chicken, wasn’t tasty at all and rhe samosa was really bad. Don’t recommend that place at...More

review_data.title: Cheap (ish) and cheerful
review_data.content: My husband and I chose this restaurant as we were pretty fed up with having to pay about 25sf pp just for a main meal every night whilst staying in Zurich so found this through cheap eats. It is more of a takeaway than restaurant...More

review_data.title: Super leckeres indisches Curry
review_data.content: Ein kleiner TakeAway mit einigen Sitzplätzen. Es gibt jeweils 4 verschiedenen Currys und einige verschiedene Beilagen. Wir gehen oft über...More

review_data.title: A good curry in Zürich
review_data.content: Friendly service. Generous portions. Pre-cooked and microwave heated upon order but curry's are delish. Only thing missing...Indian sweets... Good value for money.

review_data.title: Klein aber super fein
review_data.content: Tiny take-out place, almost hidden, but well worth it. Huge portions, super fresh and tasty food. Highly recommended for adventurers.

review_data.title: Favorite Indian in Zürich!
review_data.content: Never got disappointed at Cima Curry in Zürich and visiting this place for years. The owner is very friendly and food is athentic and always delicious - do not miss out to try the aubergine veggies when they have!

review_data.title: A great Indian Food Standby Since Years!
review_data.content: Cima Curry is always my go to restaurant to pick up food for lunch or dinner. It is basic Indian style food but very good. I love it and will continue to patronage it. My favorite is the spicy chicken. yum! yum!

review_data.title: Fast casual Indian food but tasted authentic
review_data.content: Came in for a quick lunch, had the plate of mixed vegetarian curries. There was nothing that stood out as amazing, but five or six distinct dishes with rice, all differently spiced and with different vegetables. Not greasy and very tasty. Good value lunch for...More

review_data.title: Bestes indisches koddu rotty
review_data.content: Von aussen ganz unscheinbar aber Das essen war absolut unglaublich gut!!! Die preise mehr als fair und die bediehnung freundlich!...More

review_data.title: A secret gem
